name: Circus Splendor
description:
Circus Splendor is an action/platform game in which the player controls a clown in three different stages. Each stage gets more difficult. Player must do tasks like avoiding enemies and completing stages to earn some points. Bonus points are awarded to the remaining life of each stage.

How to play: Press up-arrow on keyboard to jump and avoid the obstacles

Gitlab repository link: 1-Week Game Jam

Assets and sounds credits:

  • Clown
  • Tiger
  • Horse
  • Fire
  • Monkey
  • Rope
  • Background 1
  • Background 2
  • Press Start 2P Font
  • Circus Themed Song

Created with Godot Engine 3.1.1
